paper_title.description: The full title of the academic paper.

dataset_name.description: The name of the dataset as mentioned in the paper.

dataset_url.description: The direct URL link where the dataset is hosted, excluding HuggingFace links.

hosting_platform.description: The name of the platform hosting the data (e.g., Zenodo, Figshare, Dryad, Institutional Repository).

organ_type.description: The specific organs or tissues involved in the study (e.g., kidney, liver, heart).

cryopreservation_method.description: The technique used, such as vitrification, slow freezing, or isochoric freezing.

data_modality.description: The type of data provided (e.g., micro-CT scans, thermal properties, histological images, viability assays).

dataset_size.description: The quantitative size of the dataset (e.g., number of samples, gigabytes).

access_protocol.description: The method required to access the data.
